content: छुर् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (छोरति, छुरित) {@--1@} To cut, divide. {@--2@} To engrave. {vII.v} {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> ( छुरति, छुरित) {@--1@} To cover, smear, daub, inlay, coat, envelop. {@--2@} To intermix. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (छोरयति, छुरयति) {@--1@} To inlay, set with mosaic ornaments. {@--2@} To overspread. {@--3@} To besmear; <ls>Māl. 9. 30.</ls>
